name: Antistatus
description: You are immune to a single status effect.

name: Resistance
description: You have Resistance to a single damage type (not physical damage).

name: Amulet
description: You gain a +1 bonus to Magic Defense.

name: Bulwark
description: You gain a +1 bonus to Defense.

name: Dual Resistance
description: You have Resistance to two damage types (not physical damage).

name: Swordbreaker
description: You have Resistance to physical damage.

name: Immunity
description: You have Immunity to a single damage type (not physical damage).

name: Omnishield
description: You gain a +1 bonus to Defense and Magic Defense.

name: Perfect Health
description: You are immune to all status effects.

name: Magical
description: The weapon targets Magic Defense instead of Defense.

name: Hunter
description: The weapon deals 5 extra damage to creatures of a particular Species.

name: Piercing
description: Damage dealt by the weapon ignores Resistances.

name: Dual Hunter
description: The weapon deals 5 extra damage to creatures belonging to one of two particular Species.

name: Multi
description: Attacks with the weapon have multi (2).

name: Status
description: Each target hit by the weapon suffers (choose one: dazed, shaken, slow, weak).

name: Status Plus
description: Each target hit by the weapon suffers (choose one: enraged, poisoned).

name: Spiteful
description: The weapon deals 5 damage if you miss your Accuracy check.

name: Lifestealing
description: When you hit with this weapon, you regain 5 HP.

name: Opportunist
description: The weapon deals 5 extra damage to creatures in crisis.

name: Slaughter
description: If your attack targets more than one creature, deal 2 additional damage for each creature that you hit.

name: Lifebane
description: The weapon deals 10 extra damage to creatures at full health.

name: Wingcutter
description: The weapon deals 5 damage to flying creatures.

name: Empower Element
description: Choose an element when you acquire this weapon. Damage from spells with that element deals +2 damage.

name: Implement
description: Count as an arcane implement.

name: Guard Piercer
description: This weapon deals 10 extra damage to creatures who are guarding. Apply the damage after accounting for elemental affinities.

name: Mind Drain
description: Whenever you hit one or more creatures with this weapon, each of them loses 10 Mind Points.

name: Taunting
description: You gain +2 bonus to Accuray Checks and Magic checks against enraged targets.
